TEAMS_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Teams allow you to organize members into groups based on their responsibilities. A member can belong to multiple teams. When working collaboratively, you can assign conversations to specific teams.

LIST.404: There are no teams created on this account.

CREATE.TITLE: Create a new team
CREATE.DESC: Add a title and description to your new team.

AGENTS.TITLE: Add members to team - {teamName}
AGENTS.DESC: Add Members to your newly created team. This lets you collaborate as a team on conversations, get notified on new events in the same conversation.

WIZARD_CREATE.TITLE: Create
WIZARD_CREATE.BODY: Create a new team of members.

WIZARD_FINISH.TITLE: Finish
WIZARD_FINISH.BODY: You are all set to go!

CREATE.TITLE: Edit your team details
CREATE.DESC: Edit title and description to your team.

AGENTS.TITLE: Add members to team - {teamName}
AGENTS.DESC: Add Members to your newly created team. All the added members will be notified when a conversation is assigned to this team.

EDIT_WIZARD_DETAILS.TITLE: Team details
EDIT_WIZARD_DETAILS.BODY: Change name, description and other details.

EDIT_WIZARD_FINISH.TITLE: Finish
EDIT_WIZARD_FINISH.BODY: You are all set to go!

TEAM_FORM.ERROR_MESSAGE: Couldn't save the team details. Try again.

ADD.TITLE: Add members to team - {teamName}
ADD.DESC: Add Members to your newly created team. This lets you collaborate as a team on conversations, get notified on new events in the same conversation.

FINISH.TITLE: Your team is ready!
FINISH.MESSAGE: You can now collaborate as a team on conversations. Happy supporting

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Couldn't delete the team. Try again.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete the team?
CONFIRM.MESSAGE: Deleting the team will remove the team assignment from the conversations assigned to this team.

AUTO_ASSIGN.LABEL: Allow auto assign for this team.
